SELECT
p.name AS patientName, d.name AS doctorName, am.appointment_date AS appointmentDate, am.status AS status, am.created_at AS createdAt, am.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM appointments am LEFT JOIN patients p ON am.patient_id = p.patient_id LEFT JOIN doctors d ON am.doctor_id =d.doctor_id WHERE am.is_valid = 1 AND p.is_valid=1 AND d.is_valid=1
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{patientName}, '%')
AND d.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{doctorName}, '%')
